definition[0]: when someone is unfriendly and full of anger towards another person
example[0]: They eyed each other with open hostility.
definition[1]: strong or angry opposition to something
example[3]: The reform program was greeted with hostility by conservatives.
example[4]: There is a lot of public hostility to the tax.
example[5]: Pictures of refugees aroused popular hostility (=felt by a lot of people) towards the war.
